fields_of_interest: Energy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
BSC is part of the steering board of the ETP 4HPC, the European Technology Platform for High Performance Computing. 
BSC is partecipating in several H2020 projects and activities, mainly within the ICT workprogramme, FET-HPC, Climate Change, Energy
organisation_name: Barcelona Supercomputing Center- Centro Nacional de Supercomputación (BSC)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The BSC-CNS is the Spanish centre of supercomputing for cross-disciplinary use, at the service of the national scientific and technical community and public and private entities to promote international collaboration and connected via communications networks to other centres and entities in its field.
relevant_communication: ETP4HPC roadmap, partecipation in PRACE projects (Partnership for Advanced Computing in Europe) and in the new project EPI, European Processor Initiative, a new Framework Partnership Initiative to co-design, develop and bring on the market a European low-power microprocessor.
